hypothesis_tests.name: Hardware Encoding Adjustments
hypothesis_tests.description: Automatic camera encoding adjustments cause metadata signatures

hypothesis_tests.name: Network Transmission Effects
hypothesis_tests.description: Network streaming causes compression and metadata artifacts

hypothesis_tests.name: Storage System Processing
hypothesis_tests.description: VMS or storage system processing causes metadata artifacts

hypothesis_tests.name: Environmental Factors
hypothesis_tests.description: Scene changes and environmental factors cause compression variations

overall_assessment.recommendation: Additional investigation required before concluding video editing
